dmca.title: DE-PUBLISHED AT SUBMITTER'S REQUEST
dmca.body:
Please be advised that The Poverty Game is copyrighted in Canada and the US.  As well, Industrial Design patents apply to the name and layout of the board game.  The Poverty Game is an instructional tool used in universities in Canada, the US and Europe to help students in social service related courses understand the effects of poverty.  It is also used by community based social sercice agencies and church groups to help people empathize with their clients dealing with poverty in their life.  Many Members of Pariliament participated in a workshop on poverty where they played The Poverty Game. 
You must immediately stop using the term "The Poverty Game" or any reference to it.  Failure to do so will result in legal action.
If you have any questions regarding this issue you can contact me at [private] or email me at [private]@bbbsedmonton.org

Sincerely,
Garth Tyler-Neher,
co-author/producer of The Poverty Game
